thread.title: Kenya: Teachers Urged to End Strike
thread.title_full: Kenya: Teachers Urged to End Strike

title: Kenya: Teachers Urged to End Strike
text:
Africa: Sharing Picture Books Can Make Children Smarter, More Attentive By Elizabeth Were 
KIAMBU woman representative Annah Nyokabi has urged teachers to go back to school for the sake of students. 
Nyokabi said form four and standard eight candidates are the most affected by the teachers' strike as the national exams start next month. 
"The candidates need teachers to assist them in revision and guide them on how to approach certain questions during exams," Nyokabi told the Star on the phone last Friday. 
She said most candidates are nervous because they think they have not exhausted the syllabus or revised enough for the exams. 
Nyokabi said the government should look for a way to pay teachers, "even if in phases". Kenya
